translation: to adjust or change to suit new conditions
example: I had to adapt to the new environment.
exampleTranslation: I had to adapt to the new environment.

translation: to take for granted or suppose something is true without proof.
example: I assume you will join us for the meeting.
exampleTranslation: I assume you will join us for the meeting.

translation: the simplest or most important part of something.
example: This is just the basic version of the program.
exampleTranslation: This is just the basic version of the program.

example: We need to determine the cause of the problem.
exampleTranslation: We need to determine the cause of the problem.

translation: to roughly calculate or judge the value of something
example: Can you estimate the cost of the project?
exampleTranslation: Can you estimate the cost of the project?

example: I want to improve my English skills.
exampleTranslation: I want to improve my English skills.

translation: to keep something in good condition
example: You must maintain a healthy lifestyle.
exampleTranslation: You must maintain a healthy lifestyle.

translation: unwilling or hesitant to do something
example: She was reluctant to speak in front of the class.
exampleTranslation: She was reluctant to speak in front of the class.

translation: to give assistance or help someone with something
example: I will support you no matter what.
exampleTranslation: I will support you no matter what.

translation: to offer an idea or recommendation
example: I suggest you take a break.
exampleTranslation: I suggest you take a break.
